title: Reward: Sit in same spot after fard for women at home or only masjid? Can I lie down assim al hakeem
transcript: is sitting on the same spot after Fort prayer limited to those who pray in Masjid or women praying at home this depends on the reward you are looking for if you're talking about the Hadith where the Prophet says whoever prays in congregation and remain seated where he had prayed remembering Allah till the sun rises and then prays to raka then Allah would Grant him as if he completed umrah and Hajj complete complete complete this is only for those who prayed the Masjid but if you're talking about the Hadith where the Prophet says you are still in prayer even if you concluded your prayer as long as you're sitting in the position where you had prayed unless you break your wudu or move out move away in this case your reward is disconnected so for the second Hadith yes a woman who sits after heart prayer on her uh same spot remembering Allah azzawajal she is considered to be praying even if she doesn't remember her life she just sits there the angel is right as if she's still praying and continuing to pray can she lie down I don't know I could not say yes or no can she move somewhere else yes the most authentic opinion among Scholars regarding the first Hadith in the Masjid that removing in the same Masjid in the vicinity of the Masjid would still Grant you the reward on Allah azzawajal Knows Best for
